name: GOLD BRICK BREAKER: Ball Shooting HD
name_original: GOLD BRICK BREAKER: Ball Shooting HD
description:
Time to blast blocks and make some money in GOLD BRICK BREAKER. The classic style breakout game has evolved. Collect more balls with each shot, aim for the blocks with the highest energy, and watch money fall from the sky when they explode.
Don't let the gold blocks reach the bottom of the screen or its game over.

Super simple addictive fun which anybody can play.

Download it now and enjoy blasting that gold :)
